summary: This is an email exchange between two attorneys, Robert Glassman and an unnamed sender, regarding the estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein. The email includes scheduling attempts and a confidentiality notice from Glassman's law firm, Panish Shea & Boyle LLP.

keyFacts: The email discusses the 'Estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein' as of September 2020, indicating ongoing legal matters after his death.
Robert Glassman is an attorney with Panish Shea & Boyle LLP involved in these estate matters.
The correspondence includes a standard legal confidentiality notice, typical for attorney-client communications.
The email attachment is named 'L to Magistrate Percell 09.09.20.pdf', suggesting a legal filing or document submitted to a magistrate.
